mapper.select: select mt.mentee_id, mt.mentor_id, mt.relation, mb.user_img from mentoring mt left join member mb on mt.mentor_id=mb.member_id where mentee_id=#{mentee_id}

select b.board_num, b.board_writer, b.board_type, b.board_own,b.board_hit, b.board_content, b.board_title, b.board_pw, b.board_date, b.board_cate, b.board_tag, m.user_img from board b left join member m on b.board_writer=m.member_id where board_num = #{board_num} and board_writer = #{board_writer}
select board_num, board_writer, board_hit, board_title, board_date from board where board_own=#{board_own} and board_type="board" order by board_num desc;
select c.comment_num, c.board_num, c.comment_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_date, m.user_img from comment c left join member m on c.comment_id=m.member_id where board_num= #{board_num};
mapper.delete: delete from message where msg_num =#{msg_num} and receive_id = #{receive_id}
mapper.select: select msg.receive_id, msg.member_id, msg.send_date, msg.content, msg.mentor_msg, msg.msg_num, mb.user_img from message msg left join member mb on msg.member_id=mb.member_id where receive_id = #{member_id}
